description_examples: Any light rail or street level system within a metropolitan area.
Any underground rail system within a metropolitan area.
Used for intercity or long-distance travel.
Used for short- and long-distance bus routes.
Used for short- and long-distance boat service.
Used for street-level rail cars where the cable runs beneath the vehicle, e.g., cable car in San Francisco.
suspended cable car (e.g., gondola lift, aerial tramway). Cable transport where cabins, cars, gondolas or open chairs are suspended by means of one or more cables.
Any rail system designed for steep inclines
Electric buses that draw power from overhead wires using poles
Railway in which the track consists of a single rail or a beam
Telefèric de Montjuïc (ES), Saleve (CH), Roosevelt Island Tramway (US)
